column2: I *must* talk about their cava sangria. It was my first time trying a cava sangria
column3: and I was first wary to try it because my friend compared it to a bubbly champagne (I do NOT like champagne). However
column4: it was far from champagne--a good thing. In fact
column7: and I didn't taste the alcohol unlike a red sangria I've had at other tapas restaurants. There were also apples in the sangria
column8: which I found very refreshing. We ordered a pitcher of the cava sangria
